dma.config.gui.title: Dream Masa Addition - Config - Version: %s
dma.config.category.all.name: All
dma.config.category.feature_toggle.name: Feature Toggles
dma.config.category.lists.name: Lists
dma.config.category.fixes.name: Fixes
dma.config.option.windowResizable.name: windowResizable
dma.config.option.windowResizable.commen: Set whether the game window size can be changed.
dma.config.option.quickCraftWithRecipeBo: Holding Shift and clicking on a recipe item in the RecipeBook will craft all available items in your inventory into that item at once. This feature relies on the ItemScroller.
dma.config.option.ignoreSpecNBTTagsWhenS: When using OMMC(MC<=1.20.4)/ItemScroller(MC>=1.21) , ignore items with specified NBT tags when sorting items.
Names of NBT tags to ignore when sorting. Items with tags of these names will be ignored.
dma.config.option.fixTweakerooGammaOverr: Fixed the issue that Tweakeroo's gamma override did not take effect when the client was launched.
